verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We're marching to Zion
Beautiful, beautiful Zion
We're marching upward to Zion
The beautiful city of God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come ye that love the Lord
And let your joys be known
Join in a song with sweet accord.
Join in a song with sweet accord,
And thus surround the throne,
And thus surround the throne.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We're marching to Zion
Beautiful, beautiful Zion
We're marching upward to Zion
The beautiful city of God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Let those refuse to sing
Who never knew our God
But children of the heavenly King (2x)
May speak their joys abroad. (2x)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
We're marching to Zion
Beautiful, beautiful Zion
We're marching upward to Zion
The beautiful city of God.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
The hills of Zion yields
A thousand sacred sweets
Before we reach the heavenly fields (2x)
Or walk the golden streets. (2x)

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
We're marching to Zion
Beautiful, beautiful Zion
We're marching upward to Zion
The beautiful city of God.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Then let our songs abound
And every tear be dry
We're marching through Emmanuel's ground (2x)
To fairer worlds on high. (2x)
